markdownRemark.html: RDBOX(A Robotics Developers BOX) is packed with network applications, container apps based Kubernetes that are useful for developing ROS ROBOT. Just like a tool box.

frontmatter.title: Welcome to RDBOX!!
frontmatter.meta_description: RDBOX is a powerful partner in the IT field for "ROS (Robot Operating System) robots". You will be able to automatically construct a secure, highly scalable Wi-Fi network and Kubernetes cluster for container applications. For example, You will get a simpler and creative development experience than deploying with traditional roslaunch. Furthermore, it becomes easy to control a lot of groups of robots. Make Robot Engineers' Work a Lot Easier. You can control Network Robot with ease by RDBOX.
